title: HTML Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML fundamentals!

questions.question: What is the correct HTML element for the largest heading?
questions.code: <!-- Which tag creates the largest heading? -->
questions.explanation: The <h1> tag defines the largest and most important heading in HTML.

questions.question: What is the output of this code?
options: The word 'emphasized' will be displayed in italic
The word 'emphasized' will be displayed in bold
questions.explanation: The <em> tag is used to emphasize text, which browsers typically display in italic.

questions.question: What is the correct HTML for creating a hyperlink?
questions.code: <!-- Which creates a link to example.com? -->
questions.explanation: The <a> tag with the href attribute is used to create hyperlinks in HTML.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define an unordered list?
questions.explanation: The <ul> tag defines an unordered (bulleted) list. The <ol> tag defines an ordered (numbered) list.

questions.question: What is the correct HTML for inserting an image?
questions.explanation: The tag with the src attribute is used to insert images in HTML. The alt attribute provides alternative text for the image.
